storm2013.utilities
Class Accelerator

java.lang.Object
  storm2013.utilities.Accelerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
PIDOutput, SpeedController
public class Accelerator
extends Object
implements SpeedController

Accelerates a motor (specified by the speed controller) up to the output speed. It also makes sure the output value does not go outside the range set by the minimum and maximum speed.

Author:
Joe
